bio: Project Manager at General Magic, Co-Founder of Ethereum Mexico & Delegate at Optimism. Passionate about female/LATAM communities in web3.
contributionDescription: My journey with Optimism began in April when I embraced the role of a delegate advocating in Twitter Spaces, podcasts, and conducted workshops. I've fostered connections with diverse communities across Latin America. My aim is to empower anyone, regardless of their background, to participate and contribute to Optimism's Governance. I've collaborated with various groups and guided individuals in navigating the governance landscape. I also participated in a mission with H.E.R. LATAM, offering a workshop on governance principles and guiding aspiring delegates. My passion lies in bridging the gap between newcomers and governance.

impactDescription: I naturally connected with diverse communities, inviting them to join Optimism's governance journey. My guidance and support facilitated participation in missions and grants, impacting communities like Espacio Cripto, Cryptoversidad, H.E.R. LATAM, and Cryptonikas. I also offered guidance to individuals and communities interested in governance. My passion lies in onboarding, and I intend to keep nurturing these connections.
